Package main

Class GameSetup

java.lang.Object
main.Environment
main.GameSetup
public class GameSetup extends Environment
An extension of the main Environment class; handles the initial game setup tasks such as setting the game difficulty and length and generating the player's initial team.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameSetup

      public GameSetup()
      Constructor. Starts the GUI, generates the initial state of the stadium, and begins inital generation of the player's Athletes.

  • Method Details

    • setDifficulty

      public void setDifficulty(String difficulty)
      Sets the game difficulty. Will affect the player's initial funds and stat generation for enemy Athletes.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - String containing the selected difficulty as chosen by the player.

    • getDifficulty

      public String getDifficulty()
      Gets the stored difficulty setting.
      Returns:
      String containing either "Normal" or "Hard".

    • setTeamName

      public void setTeamName(String teamName) throws InvalidNameException
      Checks if player's team name is within acceptable bounds (3-15 characters).
      Parameters:
      teamName - Intended team name.
      Throws:
      InvalidNameException

    • setLength

      public void setLength(int weeks)
      Set the game length.
      Parameters:
      weeks - Number of weeks for the season to last.

    • getWeeks

      public int getWeeks()
      Gets the total number of weeks the game season will last.
      Returns:
      Int representing the final week of the season.

    • getCurrentWeek

      public static int getCurrentWeek()
      Gets the current week of the game season.
      Returns:
      Int representing the current week.

    • createPlayerTeam

      public void createPlayerTeam()
      Generates a Shop, sets the player's starting funds, and prompts player to purchase Athletes until their arrays are full.
